typeSystemDescription.name: Baleen Type System - Templates
typeSystemDescription.description:
XML definition of the Baleen type system for document templates.
This XML file classified as UK OFFICIAL.

typeDescription.name: uk.gov.dstl.baleen.types.templates.TemplateFieldDefinition
typeDescription.description: A field definition in a template document.

featureDescription.name: name
featureDescription.description: The name of the identified template field.

typeDescription.name: uk.gov.dstl.baleen.types.templates.TemplateField
typeDescription.description: An field identified from a template

featureDescription.name: name
featureDescription.description: The name of the identified template field.

typeDescription.name: uk.gov.dstl.baleen.types.templates.Record
typeDescription.description: Start marker of a record (multiple fields) in a document (eg a row in a table).

featureDescription.name: marker
featureDescription.description: Which type of record marker - either 'begin' or 'end'

featureDescription.name: name
featureDescription.description: The name of the record, eg Address
